package.name: kcachegrind
package.description: KCachegrind is a cachegrind viewer application which can also be used together with XDebug

package.name: umbrello
package.shortDescription: An UML modeling tool for KDE
package.description: Umbrello UML Modeller is a Unified Modelling Language diagram programme for KDE. UML allows you to create diagrams of software and other systems in a standard format.

package.name: lokalize
package.shortDescription: A computer-aided translation system for KDE
package.description: Lokalize is a computer-aided translation system that focuses on productivity and performance. Lokalize applies a paragraph-by-paragraph translation approach when translating documentation, and takes a message-by-message approach when translating GUI components..

package.name: kbugbuster
package.shortDescription: a bug triaging application for KDE

package.name: kate
package.shortDescription: a MDI text editor application for KDE

package.name: kompare
package.description: Kompare is a free software graphical computer application which helps the user to compare two different text files or two directories.
